tasks.task_description: Update registration flow to auto-generate tokens with solution_id
Add redirect logic after registration with token parameters
Update solution catalog links to include token and email parameters

description: Implement Control Plane MVP - Token generation, registration integration, and solution catalog links
context: Implemented Control Plane MVP with token generation, registration integration, and solution catalog links. Created generate-solution-token and validate-token APIs, updated registration flow to auto-generate tokens with solution_id, added redirect logic after registration, and updated solution catalog to include token and email parameters in solution URLs.
